title: Happy Holidays!
description: Maddie and Emily wish you Happy Holidays and share some science facts you can show off at your next holiday party. Plus, a little reminder of how you can show your support for the show. Find and donate to your local public radio station at donate.npr.org/short. Follow Maddie and Emily on Twitter, @maddie_sofia and @emilykwong1234. Email the show at shortwave@npr.org.

itunes:title: Happy Holidays!
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:subtitle: Ho ho ho.
